item.title: AI Avatar Video Generators Will Hurt Human Creativity
item.description: AI Avatar Video Generators: Potential Risks and Benefits AI avatar video generators are a new technology that can create realistic videos of people that don’t actually exist. These generators could be used for a variety of purposes, such as creating fake news videos or generating deepfakes.
